{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Microsoft |model=MN-740 |revision= |upc=805529792128 |ean= |asin=B00005QBX9 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/23/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=bridge |fcc_id=C3KMN740 |ic_id=3048A-MN740 |pwr_v=6 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2312A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=39VF080A-90-4C-EK |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=ICSI |ram1_model=IC42S16400-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Kendin |eth_chip2_model=KS8721B |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Microsoft Broadband Networking Xbox Wireless Adapter''
[http://download.microsoft.com/download/b/6/9/b69c956c-85d9-4641-aa6f-1548391e0967/mn740_users_guide.pdf User's Guide] For the original filing (09/26/2003)... :"(C) 2003 Microsoft", "HW Rev A4", and "MN-740" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The device uses engineering samples of the AR2312A (AR2312A-ES) and AR2112 (AR2112-ES) A MAC label w/ a 00:03:2F ('''Global Sun Technology''') OUI is affixed to the board. For the later filing (11/23/2003) and presumed production model... :"(C) 2003 Microsoft", "MN-740", and "HW Rev B2" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The firmware on this device can apparently be changed to that of the D-Link DGL-3420 (WPA support). See [http://www.dslreports.com/forum/remark,13360873 here]. Notes: - No firmware was found - OS: Probably similar with [[D-Link DGL-3420]]
